mng: gate, door, gateway, doorway, opening, valve, switch, way to do something, knack, family, house, (religious) sect, school (of thought), class, category, phylum or division (taxonomy), classifier for large guns, classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology, (suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

exm.mng: gate, door, gateway, doorway, opening, valve, switch, way to do something, knack, family, house, (religious) sect, school (of thought), class, category, phylum or division (taxonomy), classifier for large guns, classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology, (suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
door, strategic gateway, portal, faction, sect, family status, family, web portal, (old) brothel
entrance door, to enter a door, introduction (to a subject)
Xiamen or Amoy, subprovincial city in Fujian, abbr. 廈|厦[Xia4]
to drop in, to visit, to lock a door, (of a shop) to close, to go and live with one's wife's family, in effect becoming a member of her family
a neglected branch (of arts, science, sports etc), fig. a complete unknown who wins a competition
way of doing sth, the right social connection
